content:
<rule id="technology-usage-connect-01101" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <javaclass references="com.sun.jna.{*}">
                    <location>CONSTRUCTOR_CALL</location>
                    <location>IMPORT</location>
                    <location>INHERITANCE</location>
                    <location>METHOD_CALL</location>
                    <location>VARIABLE_DECLARATION</location>
                </javaclass>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="JNA usage">
                    <description>JNA is used in the application</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-identified name="JNA">
                    <tag name="Connect"/>
                    <tag name="Other"/>
                    <tag name="Java EE"/>
                </technology-identified>
            </perform>
        </rule>
